DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate efficacy , safety , tolerability cariprazine relative placebo treatment patient bipolar depression .
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Tolerability , Efficacy Cariprazine Patients With Bipolar Depression
DOC.criteria: Patients provide informed consent prior study specific procedure . Patients currently meet Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders , Fourth Edition , Text Revision ( DSMIVTR ) criteria bipolar I disorder confirm Structured Clinical Interview ( SCID ) DSMIVTR bipolar I depression without psychotic feature . Patients normal physical examination , laboratory , vital sign , and/ echocardiogram ( ECG ) . Verified previous manic mixed episode . Patients total Hamilton Rating Scale Depression ( HAMD ) 17 score ≥ 20 . Patients HAMD17 item 1 score ≥ 2 . Patients Clinical Global Impression Severity ( CGIS ) score ≥ 4 . Patients DSMIVTR diagnosis axis I disorder bipolar I disorder primary focus treatment within previous 6 month .
